hero.title: Moataz gabr
hero.description: We specialize in designing and implementing interior and exterior decorations and wooden kitchens with the highest levels of quality and creativity to transform your space into a masterpiece that reflects your lifestyle.

about.title: Moataz Gabr
about.paragraph1: Since 2008, we have been providing high-quality interior design and architectural engineering services in Hurghada and Assiut, New Egypt, and currently in Shorouk City and Nasr City.
about.paragraph2: We specialize in providing innovative solutions that meet our clients' needs and exceed their expectations.
about.paragraph3: We are a leading company in the field of interior design, offering innovative and creative solutions to turn your vision into reality. With years of experience and a team of talented designers, we always strive to provide the highest levels of quality and excellence in every project.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: We aspire to be the first choice in the field of designing and implementing kitchens and interior decoration, by providing innovative, high-quality solutions that exceed our customers’ expectations.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Transforming spaces into exceptional places that reflect the personality and lifestyle of our clients, by combining creative design, meticulous execution and distinguished service.

our_values.title: Our Values
our_values.description: We believe in high quality, continuous innovation, integrity in dealing, and focus on customer satisfaction. These values ​​are the basis of our success and distinction in the market.

experience.title: Well Experience
experience.description: We have a long experience in the field of interior design and wooden kitchen

creative_innovations.title: Creative Innovations
creative_innovations.description: We are constantly looking for new and innovative solutions to meet our clients' needs

high_quality.title: High Quality
high_quality.description: We adhere to the highest quality standards in all our projects

customer_satisfaction.title: Customer Satisfaction
customer_satisfaction.description: Customer satisfaction is our primary focus

hero.title: Moataz Gabr Design
hero.subtitle: Towards appropriate solutions at the right time to meet customer expectations and needs

about.title: Who We Are
paragraphs: Moataz Gabr Interior Design and Kitchens Company was established in 2008 in Hurghada, Assiut, and Heliopolis, and currently in Shorouk City and Nasr City. The company is owned by Engineer Moataz Gabr, specializing in interior design and architectural engineering services.

Our reputation is built on the core values of efficiency, consistency, and reliability, and we provide a high level of expertise and modern integrated solutions that radically change the way you view your workspace.
Our strength lies in presenting new designs and materials that are not well-known in the market to distinguish each design and achieve its uniqueness.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We aim to produce unique designs and be globally recognized as a professional interior design company, providing solutions in the field of interior design for companies, commercial projects, and high-end residential projects.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to positively impact the lives of all clients we are honored to work with, leaving a lasting impression on their minds and imagination. Our designs must inspire and elevate the hearts and minds of all who see them.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.description: We strive to build a strong relationship with clients based on trust, commitment, and integrity. Trust is the foundation of any relationship between the client and the designer.
paragraphs: Your success and value depend on your ability to trust us to handle any situation (project process).
When we present a value proposition, we execute it, and we pledge to provide a sophisticated interior design consulting experience with outstanding customer service throughout.
Therefore, we always seek to add value to the client's trust in us.

getToKnowUs.title: Get to Know Us
getToKnowUs.description: We are a leading company in the field of interior design, offering innovative and creative solutions to turn your vision into reality. With years of experience and a team of talented designers, we always strive to provide the highest levels of quality and excellence in every project.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are an integrated team of professionals in the field of interior design and architectural engineering

hero.title: Interior Design
hero.subtitle: We transform your spaces into works of art that reflect your personality

introduction.title: Experts in Interior Design
introduction.description: We offer creative and innovative solutions in interior design, whether for residential or commercial spaces. We believe that every space has a unique story, and our mission is to tell this story through design.

points: Custom designs that reflect your personality and lifestyle
A team of experienced professional designers
Use of the latest technologies and materials in design
Commitment to specified deadlines and budgets
Exceptional customer service throughout all project phases

hero.title: Kitchen and Unit Design
hero.subtitle: Creativity that combines beauty and function in every design

introduction.title: Experts in Kitchen and Unit Design
introduction.description: We provide integrated solutions in kitchen and home unit design, focusing on quality, elegance, and function. Our experience extends for more than 15 years in delivering designs that meet our clients' needs and exceed their expectations.

categories.title: Kitchens
categories.description: Modern kitchen designs that combine elegance and functionality

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
points: Custom designs that suit your needs and lifestyle
Smart storage solutions that maximize space utilization
Professional team of designers and technicians
Quality guarantee on all our work
